pkgmetadata.longdescription: # py-avro-schemaGenerate [Apache Avro][] schemas for Python types including standard library [data-classes][] and [Pydantic data models][].:blue_book: Documentation: https://py-avro-schema.readthedocs.io## Installing```shellpython -m pip install py-avro-schema```## DevelopingTo setup a scratch/development virtual environment (under `.venv/`), first install [Tox][].Then run:```shelltox -e dev```The `py-avro-schema` package is installed in [editable mode][] inside the `.venv/` environment.Run tests by simply calling `tox`.Install code quality Git hooks using `pre-commit install --install-hooks`.## Terms & ConditionsCopyright 2022 J.P.
